name: Ectocuties (Tumblr)
description:
dude that's my ghost / ectofeature theme, yeah!
billy and spencer are fixed while the sprinkles are not. also, billy has semi-transparency!!! you can watch the sprinkles go through his head as you scroll, how nice

(this is the first theme I'm posting dear god let's hope this works)
additional_info:
modified this theme from a modified version of another theme that was modified from a theme I lost ages ago. I don't even know who to credit anymore, but if you recognize the code let me know or something I dunno

the coloring is a little weird for the sidebar & navigation, making it hard to see. it becomes visible when you click on it, but you should have a good understanding of tumblr and where you are clicking if you want to use this theme.

oh yeah I'm tumblr user vantatas hit me up or something
